title: Deployment Risk Scorecard
vision: An Azure portal page that helps platform engineers assess the blast radius and risk level of pending infrastructure deployments before they hit production. Features a risk summary strip (4 cards: Pending Deployments, High-Risk Changes, Resources Affected, Estimated Cost Delta), a sortable deployments queue table (name, source, target env, resources created/modified/deleted, risk score 0-100 with color, submitted by), an SVG blast radius dependency graph with risk-colored nodes, a risk breakdown panel with categorized factors (Public Endpoint Exposure, Missing Encryption, Oversized SKUs, No Availability Zone, Missing Tags, Destructive Deletes), a before/after diff preview for resource config changes, and a production warning message bar.
problem: Platform engineers deploying infrastructure changes have no consolidated view of deployment risk, blast radius, or cost impact. They can't easily see which pending deployments are high-risk, what resources are affected, or whether destructive changes are lurking in a deployment — leading to production incidents from unreviewed changes.
successCriteria: Risk summary strip with 4 metric cards (Pending Deployments, High-Risk Changes, Resources Affected, Estimated Cost Delta)
Deployments queue table with 6+ mock rows, sortable by risk score, columns for name/source/target/resources triple/risk score/submitted by
SVG blast radius dependency graph for selected deployment with risk-colored nodes (green/amber/red)
Risk breakdown panel with severity badges for 6 categories: Public Endpoint Exposure, Missing Encryption, Oversized SKUs, No Availability Zone, Missing Tags, Destructive Deletes
Before/after diff preview section for resource config property changes
Production warning message bar when deployment targets prod without approval gate
Copilot suggestions: Which deployment has the most destructive changes?, Are any new public endpoints being created?, Compare this deployment to last week's rollout
constraints: Mock data only — at least 6 deployment rows with plausible ARM template names, resource groups, and risk scores
SVG dependency graph for blast radius visualization
